properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 22 at 2:12AM PST until January 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...
-Small Craft Advisory conditions early Wednesday morning;
southwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas
13 to 16 ft at 14 seconds.

-Gale conditions expected late Wednesday morning and Wednesday
afternoon; south winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt
and seas around 15 ft at 12 seconds.

-Gale conditions possible Wednesday night and Thursday
morning; south winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and
seas up to 15 ft at 10 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM.

* WHEN...
-Small Craft Advisory in effect until 10 AM Wednesday
morning.

-Gale Warning in effect from 10 AM until 4 PM Wednesday.

-Gale Watch in effect Wednesday evening through Thursday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY MORNING... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
